transcript: Well of course not, but what are you gonna do to move that comb? Are you gonna be able to find a job there?

segments.text: Well of course not, but what are you gonna do to move that comb? Are you gonna be able to find a job there?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Well, of course not, but what are you going to do if you move back home?  Are you going to be able to find a job there?
